web_snippets: Ruth Taylor is a best-selling author of Wisdom for Positive Living. Her purpose is to inspire others to handle their challenges in a positive way.

Ruth Taylor-Piliae, PhD, RN, FAHA, FAAN is a Professor and the PhD Program Director (interim) in the College of Nursing at the University of Arizona.
